post.title: Stalked by Author of Several Best Selling .NET and Win32 Programming Books
post.title_plain: Stalked by Author of Several Best Selling .NET and Win32 Programming Books
post.content: First it was at Fred Meyer a week or two ago. Next it was at my favorite teriyaki resturant last Thursday. Then this past weekend, it happened again at Remlinger Farms. I think Jeff Richter is stalking me.
post.excerpt: First it was at Fred Meyer a week or two ago. Next it was at my favorite teriyaki resturant last Thursday. Then this past weekend, it happened again at Remlinger Farms. I think Jeff Richter is stalking me.
